titleStmt.title: Lent-preachers appointed by the Lord Bishop of London to preach on Wednesdays and Fridays for the year 1685/6 at St. Michael's Cornhill. St. Lawrence's St. Dunstan's in the West. St. James's.
titleStmt.author: Church of England. Diocese of London. Bishop (1675-1713 : Compton)

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed for Walter Kettilby at the Bishop's-head in St. Paul's Church-yard.,

notesStmt.note: Reproduction of originals in the Henry E. Huntington Library and Art Gallery (695:4) and the Bodleian Library (2895:12) .

place.placeName: the Bishop's-head in St. Paul's Church-yard.
